title: Redesign app to feel Shopify-like and add self-serve store creation + seller dashboard

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, Shopify-like visual design system across the app (Home, Header, Footer, Products, Suppliers, Cart, Checkout, Payment Success/Failure) with consistent spacing, typography, and component styling; use English for all user-facing text.

quotes: Shopify এর মতো করে দিন প্লিজ

acceptanceCriteria: All existing pages render with a consistent theme (no mixed styles between pages).
All visible UI text is in English.
Design includes a modern ecommerce layout: sticky header, clear primary CTA styling, consistent cards/forms/buttons, and polished empty/loading states.

requirements.text: Choose and enforce ONE distinct visual theme (colors, typography, layout) that is not blue/purple-dominant, and update Tailwind/theme tokens accordingly so the whole UI matches (including gradients currently used in HomePage/Header).

quotes: Shopify এর মতো সব ডিজাইন করে দিন

acceptanceCriteria: Theme tokens in global CSS are updated to match the chosen theme, and pages/components use those tokens rather than hard-coded purple gradients.
Header brand styling and Home hero styling are updated to match the new theme.
Light and dark mode remain usable (contrast and readability).

requirements.text: Add a self-serve “Create Store” (seller onboarding) flow so any authenticated user can open a store on the platform by creating/updating their supplier profile (store name, description, contact info).

quotes: যাতে যে কে অনলাইন স্টোর খোলতে পারে

acceptanceCriteria: A new UI entry point exists (e.g., in Header navigation or a prominent dashboard CTA) for authenticated users to create a store.
If the user already has a supplier profile, the UI shows an edit/update form instead of a create form.
Successful create/update shows a clear success state and the user can proceed to seller features.

requirements.text: Implement a seller dashboard that is accessible only to users who have a supplier profile (store created) and provides: store overview, list of their products, and actions to add/update/delete products.

quotes: Shopify এর মতো করে দিন প্লিজ

acceptanceCriteria: Non-sellers (no supplier profile) are prevented from accessing seller dashboard routes and are shown an in-app prompt to create a store.
Sellers can view a list of only their products (not all products).
Sellers can add a product (name, description, price, stock quantity), update it, and delete it; the Products listing reflects changes after mutations.

requirements.text: Add backend endpoints needed to support seller dashboard ergonomics without requiring the frontend to pass principals manually (e.g., getCallerSupplierProfile and getCallerSupplierProducts) and wire them into new React Query hooks.

quotes: Shopify এর মতো করে দিন প্লিজ

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a query to fetch the caller’s supplier profile (or null if none).
Backend exposes a query to fetch only the caller’s products.
Frontend uses React Query hooks for these endpoints and updates UI correctly after add/update/delete actions.

requirements.text: Upgrade the storefront browsing experience to be Shopify-like: improve Products and Suppliers pages with better merchandising UI (filters/sorting remain), and add navigation from Suppliers to a supplier-specific product listing.

quotes: Shopify এর মতো সব ডিজাইন করে দিন

acceptanceCriteria: Suppliers page has a working “View Products” action that takes the user to a filtered product list for that supplier.
Products page layout looks like a modern storefront (improved grid, product media, pricing emphasis, consistent badges).
Existing search and sorting continue to work.

requirements.text: Add and use required static generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update UI to use them consistently where appropriate (brand + hero + placeholders).

quotes: Shopify এর মতো সব ডিজাইন করে দিন

acceptanceCriteria: All required images are placed at frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly from the frontend.
Product cards do not show broken images (a placeholder is always displayed if no product image exists).
Header branding uses the generated logo asset (or an icon+logo lockup).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; create backend/migration.mo only if state shape changes require it.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
Adding external databases or non-Motoko backend services.
Building a full Shopify theme marketplace or theme editor.

required: Modern minimalist ecommerce logo mark + wordmark, neutral palette with an emerald (or similar non-blue/purple) accent (shop-logo.dim_512x128.png)
Wide hero banner illustration in a clean ecommerce style (no text), suitable for a homepage hero background (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
Neutral product placeholder image (simple studio backdrop) (product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)
